title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2601.15 - Subject matter files
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2601.15 - Subject matter files

State Regulations

Subject matter of the New York State Environmental Facilities

Corporation files is maintained in the following manner: (a) administrative files; (b) financial information; (c) loans and investments; (d) accounting; (e) operations; (f) program records; (g) retired programs; and
(h) EFC board of director's files. The records access officers will assist applicants to
identify the location of records. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2601.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
